title: Did he praise the CEO of Goya Foods Trump?
subtitle: Guiway was invited to the province of the Spanish People ' s Food and Spice Company in July 2020.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: At a press conference in July 2020, the CEO of Goya Foods Robert Onani said: "We are all truly blessed" to have a leader like Donald Trump, leading to online calls to boycott the company's products.
